required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ADC Combined With Hypofractionated Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2 for Treatment of HER-2 Positive Advanced Solid Tumors(PRaG3.0)
clinical_study.official_title: Antibody-Drug Conjugate Combined With Hypofractionated Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Inhibitor Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2 for the Treatment Advanced Refractory Solid Tumors With HER-2 Positive(PRaG3.0)

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, single-arm, Phase II investigator-initiated trial of antibody-drug conjugate combined with hypofractionated radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor sequential GM-CSF and IL-2 for treatment of advanced refractory solid tumors with HER-2 positive

primary_outcome.description: Objective Response Rate was defined as the percentage of participants with a complete response (CR) or partial response (PR).

secondary_outcome.description: PFS was defined as the time from the first administration of study treatment to the first occurrence of disease progression as determined by investigator using RECIST v1.1 or death from any cause, whichever comes first.
DCR was defined as the percentage of participants with a complete response (CR), partial response (PR), or stable disease (SD)
OS was defined as the time from the first administration of study treatment to death from any cause.

arm_group.arm_group_label: ADC Combined With Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2

intervention.intervention_name: ADC Combined With Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2
intervention.description: RC48-ADC combined with hypofractionated radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor sequential GM-CSF and IL-2
